about_the_game: The official soundtrack for Phantom Fury is finally here! Masterfully crafted by composer Aleks Kmiec, the Phantom Fury OST chronicles Shelly's journey to the heart of the US (shell-casings and dead mutants not included). Featuring 44 tracks for a runtime of 127 minutes.
detailed_description: The official soundtrack for Phantom Fury is finally here! Masterfully crafted by composer Aleks Kmiec, the Phantom Fury OST chronicles Shelly's journey to the heart of the US (shell-casings and dead mutants not included). Featuring 44 tracks for a runtime of 127 minutes.

  • Storage: 305 MB available space
